metadata.title: CVE-2023-27830 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC before v2.8.75 allows attackers to escalate privileges on the hostoperating system via replacing legitimate files with crafted files whenexecuting a file transfer. This is due to the fact that TightVNC runs inthe backend as a high-privileges account.

criterions.comment: tightvnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
